content: Provide me a list of 15 words that have 'ology' somewhere in them.

Sure! Here's a list of 15 words that contain "ology":

1. Biology
2. Psychology
3. Sociology
4. Anthropology
5. Geology
6. Theology
7. Technology
8. Ecology
9. Pathology
10. Cardiology
11. Dermatology
12. Astrology
13. Hematology
14. Mythology
15. Ichthyology

I hope this helps! If you have any other questions, feel free to ask.
